Welcome
Welcome to the BigWorld Technology
client demo!
Click the '>' button below for basic operating
instructions.

Game Keys
Movement W/A/S/D
Crouch C
Walk Shift
Dash Ctrl
Prev/Next Item Q/E
Drop Item X
Stow Sword 1/2/3
Exit Mode/Vehicle Esc
Next/Prev player model V/B
Random player model Ctrl+B
Random player customisation Ctrl+V
Paper/Scissors/Rock NumPad 7/8/9
Perform Gesture NumPad 0-6
Shake hands with target NumPad .

Camera & Mouse Controls
Press Tab to cycle through the 3 camera modes:
Normal camera, Orbit camera, Free camera
In Free camera mode use the Arrow keys to
move the camera.
Hold down RMB to point the camera.
Hold down LMB to orbit the camera.
Hold down both LMB & RMB to move the player.
Use the Mouse Wheel to zoom the camera.
Things that you can interact with are indicated
with a title when targeted with the mouse cursor.
Left Click to "Use" the item (pick up item, attack
monster, etc).

General
Toggle full-screen mode Alt+Enter
Change window size Tilde+F2
Screen-capture to Game Dir. PrintScreen
Teleport to locations 1-4 Ctrl+1-4
Chat Window Controls
Open chat window Enter
Send chat Type msg and press Enter
Close chat window Enter/Esc
Command help /help
Console Window Controls
Toggle dark background Tilde+F9
Close console Esc

Real-time Profiling Console
Profile Modes P
Hierarchical Profiling H
Thread Profiling T
Main Screen M
Prev/Next Entry PgUp/PgDn
Expand/Collapse Entry Enter
Profile Data Mode
Toggle thread displays 0-9
Freeze display & dump data F
Toggle inclusive timing I
Toggle profile bar graphs B

Debug (Watcher) Console
Prev/Next watcher PgUp/PgDn
Enter watcher directory Enter
Previous watcher directory Backspace
Edit watcher value Enter

Debug Controls
Float (debug) Space
Toggle Fly mode Ctrl+F
Toggle Speed Ctrl+U
Toggle sky components Tilde+F6
Cycle wireframe modes Tilde+F8
Reload scripts (with console) Tilde+F11
Reload chunks Tilde+F
Invert mouse movement Tilde+I
